key.name: poll-interval
key.description: How often to check for clipboard changes, in milliseconds. Lower values detect changes faster but use more CPU. Valid range: 100-5000ms. Default: 500ms.

key.name: monitor-clipboard
key.description: Whether to monitor the CLIPBOARD selection (Ctrl+C/Ctrl+V). This is the primary clipboard used by most applications.

key.name: monitor-primary
key.description: Whether to monitor the PRIMARY selection (middle-click paste). This is the X11/Wayland selection that updates on text highlight.

key.name: log-level
key.description: Verbosity of logging output. Options: 'none', 'error', 'info', 'debug'. Logs appear in journalctl for gnome-shell.

key.name: emit-on-empty
key.description: Whether to emit ClipboardChanged/PrimaryChanged signals when the clipboard becomes empty. Default is false to reduce noise.

key.name: deduplicate-window
key.description: Time in milliseconds to ignore duplicate clipboard changes. Helps prevent rapid-fire signals from applications that set clipboard multiple times. Default: 100ms.
